metadata.title: CVE-2019-17453 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: Bento4 1.5.1.0 has a NULL pointer dereference inAP4_DescriptorListWriter::Action in Core/Ap4Descriptor.h, related toAP4_IodsAtom::WriteFields in Core/Ap4IodsAtom.cpp, as demonstrated bymp4encrypt or mp4compact.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
